userLikesDataMapping.description: Complete list of posts the authenticated user has liked on Instagram
userLikesDataMapping.criticalInsight: Every post in this response represents content the user actively chose to like

dataLocation.responseStructure: GraphQL response containing liked posts array
dataLocation.context: This data is only available when user navigates to their activity/likes page

userDataPoints.description: Array containing all posts the user has liked

dataStructure.itemStructure: Each item represents one liked post with nested media object

post_id.description: Unique identifier of the liked post
post_id.context: Use this to track specific posts user engaged with

creator_info.context: Identifies which creators the user follows and engages with

content_details.description: Post caption containing text and hashtags

fields.text: Full caption text including hashtags and mentions

content_details.context: Reveals topics, interests, and themes user likes

timestamp.description: Unix timestamp when post was created
timestamp.context: Shows recency of content user engages with

engagement_metrics.context: Shows if user likes popular or niche content

userDataPoints.userContext: Each item in this array is a post the user explicitly liked

userDataPoints.description: Information for loading more liked posts

dataStructure.end_cursor: Token to fetch next batch of liked posts

userDataPoints.context: User may have hundreds/thousands of liked posts requiring pagination

usageContext.dataAvailability: Only accessible when user is logged in and visits their activity page
usageContext.updateFrequency: List updates in real-time as user likes/unlikes posts
usageContext.privacyNote: This is private user activity data, not publicly accessible
usageContext.analyticsValue: Provides deep insights into user preferences, interests, and engagement patterns

exampleQuery.description: How to identify and extract user likes
steps: 4. Each item = one post user liked
5. Extract creator usernames, captions, hashtags for preference analysis
